issue.title: Reprojection abilities
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

The PROXY should be able to reproject on-the-fly to other SRS. It will answer many users cases, specially for tiled WMS (WMTS) where cached tiles are in EPSG:4326 and the remote server delivers only in EPSG:21781, and would prevent from adding an extra cache for each supported SRS.


Some ideas for implementation :

http://www.neogeo-online.net/blog/archives/283/
http://mapproxy.org/

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Another ressource for this issue (java):

http://gvsigmobileonopenmoko.wordpress.com/2010/05/03/on-the-fly-reprojection-of-tiles-using-your-favorite-conventional-wms-servers/
